text.name: text_info
text.text:
[b]Instructions[/b] • You can collect coins, dollars, and amazon card by playing bingo games in [i]Bingo Day[/i]. And you may win the big jackpot of $777 in the slot games that can be triggered by bingo. • The rewards will be sent to you within 7 business days (except of weekends). Please wait patiently. If you don't receive, please contact us by mail at once. • Google is not a sponsor nor is involved in any way with these contests and sweepstakes. • Final interpretation is owned by [i]Bingo Day[/i].
[b]Rules[/b] • Coin Participate in the bingo game, each time you click on the designated grid, you will get coin Obtained by spinning the slot machine, please refer to the slot machine description for details. • U.S. dollar Participate in the bingo game, each time you click on the designated box, you will get cash Obtained by spinning the slot machine, please refer to the slot machine description for details. • Amazon Card Obtained by spinning the slot machine, please refer to the slot machine description for the rewards.
[b]Occurrence probability[/b] * Gold coin grid : 12% * Dollar grid : 13%
[b]Slot machine description[/b] Each Bingo line activates the slot machine. The winning ratio of all the items that included in the slot machine shows as follows: * Gold coins:19.1% * USD: 13.3% * 777: 7% * Amazon Card:14% * Others: 9%
